title: Remove Letter/“For You” experience and move love-letter message into Gift modal with romantic typography

requirements.text: Remove the “For You” (Letter) experience from the interactive surprises hub UI so only “Gallery” and “A Gift for You” remain selectable.

quotes: let’s get rid of the letter, the for you and keep the gallery and the roses

acceptanceCriteria: The InteractivePage no longer renders the “For You”/Letter icon card.
The InteractivePage layout updates appropriately for two cards (e.g., uses a 2-column layout at md+ instead of a 3-column layout).
The app no longer imports or opens LetterModal from the interactive hub.

requirements.text: Move the existing love-letter message content currently shown in the Letter modal into the Gift modal, replacing the current gift text content while keeping the roses bouquet visual.

quotes: move the message from the letter to the Gift and replace the text there

acceptanceCriteria: The Gift modal no longer displays the current rose color meaning paragraphs and the quote block; instead it displays the prior LetterModal message content.
The roses bouquet image remains visible in the Gift modal (the roses experience is preserved).
The Letter modal content is not accessible anywhere in the UI after removing the Letter experience.

requirements.text: Update the Gift modal typography and layout to use a clearly romantic font style and structured formatting (e.g., letter-style layout with greeting/body/sign-off styling) for the moved message.

quotes: use a nice romantic font and structure

acceptanceCriteria: The moved message in the Gift modal is visually presented in a letter-like structured format (not a single plain paragraph).
The message text uses a romantic-looking typographic treatment (e.g., cursive/serif styling via Tailwind/CSS) that is consistent within the Gift modal.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing shadcn components only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep the backend as-is; no new backend APIs are required for this change.
nonGoals: Do not add new interactive hub experiences beyond Gallery and Gift.
Do not introduce dynamic content fetching/storage for the letter or gift content (keep static frontend content).
Do not change the gallery photos unless explicitly requested.
